original: 啟稟大人，我軍輜重被<color=#b6f8f4>$country1</color>勢力劫奪。損失金錢<color=#bceea7>$num1</color>、糧草<color=#bceea7>$num2</color>！
text: Enlighten your lord, our army has been robbed by the <color=#b6f8f4>$country1</color> forces. Loss of money <color=#bceea7>$num1</color>, grain and grass <color=#bceea7>$num2</color>!
